Posts.Content: Apr 26, 2009 01:41PM debbie53 wrote: Thanks to all of you.  Your kind words truly do help.  I am starting a trial on Tuesday and I guess the protocol is to give the steroids the day before.  I am going to call tomorrow to ask for sure if it is 8mg in morning and 8 at night the day before and 8 in morning of chemo.  Sounds like a lot to me.  Although, everything I hear that I need to do lately sounds like a lot!  I truly am feeling like I am collecting my courage to go through this from this board.  Everyone here is so kind---and comforting.  This place has given me the strength to believe that I can do this. Thanks so much. Debbie
Posts.Title: How do you sleep before chemo? debbie53 jancie

Posts.Content: debbie53 wrote: Hi I am starting chemo on Tuesday and I am having a hard time sleeping.  I am to take 8 mg steroid morning and evening of Monday and then 8 mg on Tuesday morning before treatment starts.  Anyone else need to do this and still get some sleep?  I can't stop thinking.  Of all the what ifs.  I also decided to do a clinical trial for her2+ patients and am second guessing myself for days now.  I guess I need some hand-holding now and this is the best place I could think of.
